Testing VPMINSW instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 1000 -2000 3000 -4000 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 
Operand B: -1500 2500 -3500 4500 -5500 6500 -7500 8500 
Result: -1500 -2000 -3500 -4000 -5500 -6000 -7500 -8000 
Expected: -1500 -2000 -3500 -4000 -5500 -6000 -7500 -8000 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit boundary values
Operand A: -32768 32767 -32767 32766 -32766 32765 -32765 32764 
Operand B: 32767 -32768 32766 -32767 32765 -32766 32764 -32765 
Result: -32768 -32768 -32767 -32767 -32766 -32766 -32765 -32765 
Expected: -32768 -32768 -32767 -32767 -32766 -32766 -32765 -32765 
[PASS]

Test 3: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 9000 -10000 11000 -12000 
Operand B (memory): -4000 6500 -7500 8500 -9500 10500 -11500 12500 
Result: -4000 -6000 -7500 -8000 -9500 -10000 -11500 -12000 
Expected: -4000 -6000 -7500 -8000 -9500 -10000 -11500 -12000 
[PASS]

Test 4: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 
Operand B: 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 
Result: -32768 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 32767 
Expected: -32768 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 32767 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 -32768 32767 
[PASS]

VPMINSW tests PASSED
